name: Vertual Guy
description:
The game is a dynamic platformer with beautiful pixel graphics and various non-standard modes. To pass the modes and break records, you will have to learn various mechanics, and then improve your gaming skills and increase your level.

The game is unique in its modes. In it you have to play against various mobs. The game will be interesting to fans of pleasant pixel graphics and those who love platformers.

The goal of the game is to raise the level as high as possible, set records and improve your character along the way by completing higher ranks.
